name: Foxskull
description:
Help Foxskull survive the asteroid field!

A tiny little space shooter I made following a tutorial on making your first game in GameMaker Studio 2. Was trying to figure out booster animations and sounds when I decided to start learning Godot instead so I left it at this. Maybe I'll "port" it to that engine and build it out a bit for a sort of sequel at some point. There's a little bit of fun and challenge to be had so I thought why not put it up.

Very basic but pretty much functional :)

*controls are keyboard only
